Codecademy. New York City (NYC). Looking for full-time software engineers.

Codecademy is a coding education startup based in NYC, focusing on teaching users the programming skills they need to get jobs. We currently have 24+ million users and a team of 19 total (7 engineers), and use a mix of Golang, Ruby, & Javascript (React.js).

If you're interested, we can do an informational coffee chat sort of thing or just start the interview process, so let us know.

http://www.codecademy.com/about/jobs/software-engineer
